thread.title: Republicans Show All House Members a Memo Drawn From Highly Classified Information

author: Byron Tau
title: Republicans Show All House Members a Memo Drawn From Highly Classified Information
text:
WASHINGTONâ€”Republicans have made available to all House members a memo written by GOP staffers in which they raise concerns about the way the Justice Department used information from Christopher Steele, a former British intelligence official, in its application for secret court orders and warrants, according to people familiar with the matter.

In a rarely used procedural move, the House Intelligence Committee voted along party lines Thursday to make the four-page document available to all 435 House members. Republicans said...
